aboutMarito.intro: Lentswe 'Mafoko' le tswa ho Xitsonga, le bolela 'mantswe' kapa 'mabitso'. Ena ke sesebeliswa sa webu se tsoelang pele se kopanyang sekgeo se mahareng sa boholo ba puo ba Afrika Borwa le phihlello ya sejwale-jwale ya dijithale. Barati ba dipuo, bafuputsi ba NLP, le ditsebi tsa dipuo ba ka sebedisa Mafoko jwalo ka sethala se kopaneng ho fuputsa, ho kenya letsoho, le ho boloka dinane tsa mantswe a dipuo tse ngata, dipukuntsu, le mabaka a mantswe ho dipuo tse 11 tse semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa.
aboutMarito.mission: Mafoko e sebetsa hantle kokubili inthaneteng le kantle ho inthanete, e nolofalletsa setjhaba ho fumana disebediswa tse felletseng tsa dipuo, ho fana ka maikutlo, le ho sebedisana ho haheng di-lexicons tse tiileng bakeng sa dipuo tse nang le disebediswa tse fokolang. Sethala sena ke karolo ya mosebetsi o tswellang o etswang ke DSFSI (Data Science for Social Impact) Yunibesithing ya Pretoria ho etsa hore disebediswa tsa dipuo di fumanehe setjhabeng sohle le ho tsoela pele diphuputso tsa ho sebetsana le puo ya tlhaho bakeng sa dipuo tsa Afrika.
aboutMarito.teamCredit: E hahilwe ka motlotlo ke Velox

aboutMofoko.title: Ka Mafoko
aboutMofoko.content: Mafoko (a bolelang “mantsoe” ka Setswana) ke sethala sa dipuo tse ngata se reretsoeng ho keteka le ho hokahanya dipuo tse 11 tse semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa.

whyMafoko.title: Hobaneng Mafoko e le teng
whyMafoko.content: Dipuo tsa Afrika Borwa ke tse matla, tse bontshang maikutlo, ebile di hokahane ka botebo le boitsebahatso ba rona, empa tse ngata di ntse di se di emelwa ka botlalo lefatsheng la dijithale. Mafoko e hahilwe ho fetola sena. E kopanya mantsoe le meelelo e tsoang ho di-glossary tse fapaneng hore e be sebaka se le seng se ka batlwang, se etsang hore ho be bonolo ho hlahloba mantsoe, ho utlwisisa phetolelo, le ho ithuta dipuo tsohle tse 11 tse semmuso.
whyMafoko.content2: Hore na o hokahane kapa o sa hokahana inthaneteng, Mafoko e boloka tsebo ya puo e le haufi le wena. E boetse e kgothalletsa tshebedisano ka ho dumella ditjhaba ho fana ka ditlhahiso, ho arolelana maikutlo, le ho thusa ho ntlafatsa boleng ba ntlha e nngwe le e nngwe ya glossary ha nako e ntse e feta.
whyMafoko.content3: Ka ho fetola mehlodi e hasaneng ya dipuo hore e be sethala se phelang, se ntseng se hola, Mafoko e thusa ho boloka lefa la rona ha e ntse e tshehetsa thuto e akaretsang le dipatlisiso tsa dipuo tsa tlhaho bakeng sa dipuo tse nang le mehlodi e fokolang.

whoMafoko.title: E etseditswe mang
whoMafoko.content: Baithuti, barupeli, bafuputsi, le mang kapa mang ya nang le tjantjello ya puo le setso.

howMafoko.title: Mokgwa wa ho sebedisa Mafoko
howMafoko.content: O ka sebedisa Mafoko ho batla mantsoe, ho hlahloba mafapha a fapaneng a puo, ho sheba diphetolelo, le ho fana ka maikutlo a hao ho thusa ho ntlafatsa sethala sena.
howMafoko.help: Bakeng sa tlhaloso e felletseng e kenyeletsang ditaelo tse kgutshwane le di-video tsa tlhahisoleseding, etela

behindProject.title: Ka mora Morero
behindProject.content: Mafoko e hlahisitswe bakeng sa sehlopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) ho Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.

termsAndConditions.title: Melao le Maemo
termsAndConditions.welcome: Rea u amohela ho Mafoko, sethala sa dipuo tse ngata se hlophisitsoeng le ho tsamaisoa ke sehlopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) Univesithing ya Pretoria. Ka ho sebedisa Mafoko, o dumellana le Melao le Maemo ana. Ka kopo bala ka hloko pele o kena kapa o kenya letsoho sethaleng sena.
termsAndConditions.purpose: Mafoko (le bolelang “mantsoe” ka Setswana) ke sethala sa thuto se seng sa khoebo se ntlafatsang dipuo tse 11 tse semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa ka ho fana ka monyetla wa ho fumana dithesaurus tse ngata le mehlodi ya dipuo. Sethala sena se reretswe ho tshehetsa thuto e kopanetsweng, dipatlisiso, le tshebedisano har’a setjhaba sa dipuo.
termsAndConditions.user: Ho kenya letsoho ho Mafoko, jwalo ka ho kenya mantsoe, ho vouta, ho fana ka maikutlo, kapa ho etsa kopo ya ho ba setsebi sa puo, basebedisi ba tlameha ho etsa ak’haonte. O dumellana ho fana ka tlhahisoleseding e nepahetseng ha o ingodisa le ho boloka dintlha tsa hau tsa ho kena e le lekunutu. DSFSI e na le tokelo ya ho emisa kapa ho hlakola diakhaonto tse tlolang Melao ena kapa tse hlahisang diteng tse sa lokang.
termsAndConditions.contribution: Mafoko e dumella basebedisi ho kenya mantsoe, diphetolelo, ditlhaloso, le maikutlo. Ka ho fana ka ditaba, o fa DSFSI laesense e seng ya boikgethelo, e sa lefellweng ho bontsha, ho hlahisa hape, le ho aba dinehelo tsa hao ka hare ho Mafoko bakeng sa morero wa thuto le dipatlisiso.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Dinehelo tsohle di lokela ho ba tse loketseng, tse hlomphehang, le tse nepahetseng ka puo. Ditaba tse kgetholang, tse nyedisang kapa tse kgelosang di tla tloswa, mme tlolo e phetoang e ka lebisa ho emisoeng ha ak’haonte.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Basebedisi ba batlang ho ba bahlalefi ba dipuo sethaleng sena ba ka etsa dikopo ka ho fana ka bopaki ba dingolwa tsa bona tsa thuto (jwaloka lirekoto tsa Google Scholar). DSFSI e na le tokelo ya ho lekola le ho netefatsa diphihlelo pele e fana ka ditokelo tsa setsebi sa puo.
termsAndConditions.property: Sethala sa Mafoko, ho kenyeletswa moralo wa sona, sebopeho, le dithesaurus tse bokelletsweng, ke thepa ya kelello ya DSFSI le Univesithi ya Pretoria. Mantsoe le diphetolelo ka seng di dula e le thepa ya bangodi le bahlophisi ba tsona, empa di ka sebediswa hape ka hare ho Mafoko bakeng sa morero wa thuto le dipatlisiso jwalo ka ha ho hlalositswe kaholimo.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Le ha Mafoko e ikemiseditse ho fana ka tlhahisoleseding e nepahetseng le e tshepahalang ya puo, DSFSI ha e fane ka tiisetso mabapi le ho phethahala kapa ho nepahala ha ditaba. Sethala sena se fanoe “jwaloka ha se le teng” bakeng sa morero wa thuto, mme DSFSI ha e na boikarabelo bakeng sa diphoso, ho tlohellwa, kapa ditlamorao tse hlahang ho tshebediso ya sona.
termsAndConditions.commercial: Mafoko e fanoe mahala bakeng sa morero wa thuto le dipatlisiso. Ditaba tse ho sethala sena ha di a lokela ho hlahiswa hape, ho abelwa hape, kapa ho sebediswa bakeng sa phaello ntle le tumello e ngotsweng esale pele ho tswa ho DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: Mafoko ha e sebedise di-cookie, ho latela ditlhahlobo, kapa ditshebeletso tsa papatso. Tlhahisoleseding ya ak’haonte e bolokilwe feela ho nolofalletsa ho nka karolo ha mosebedisi le ho boloka tshebetso ya sethala. DSFSI ha e arolelane dintlha tsa botho le mekga e meng.
termsAndConditions.change: DSFSI e ka ntlafatsa Melao le Maemo ana ka nako tse fapaneng ho bontsha ntlafatso kapa diphetoho tsa maano. Ho tswela pele ho sebedisa Mafoko kamora ntlafatso ho bontsha tumello ya hao ho melao e ntjha.
termsAndConditions.contact: Bakeng sa dipotso kapa matshwenyeho mabapi le Melao le Maemo ana, ka kopo ikopanye le sehlopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) Univesithing ya Pretoria.

glossaryPage2.offlineMessage: Ha o hokahane - ho bontšoa data e bolokiloeng
glossaryPage2.noTermsFound: Ha ho mantsoe a fumanoeng bakeng sa lethathamo lena la mantsoe.
glossaryPage2.noTermsMatch: Ha ho mantsoe a lumellanang le patlo ea hau.
glossaryPage2.exportMessage2: ka mokhoa oo u o khethileng.
glossaryPage2.agriculture: Mantsoe a akaretsang temo, temo ea liphoofolo le lits'ebetso tsa tlhahiso ea temo.
glossaryPage2.construction: Mantsoe a sebelisoang ho mehaho, thepa ea kaho le tsamaiso ea merero.
glossaryPage2.demography: Mantsoe a bohlokoa a hlalosang litšobotsi tsa baahi le lipalo tsa sechaba.
glossaryPage2.education: Mantsoe a amanang le thuto, koetliso le litsamaiso tsa thuto.
glossaryPage2.energy: Mehopolo e amanang le tlhahiso ea matla le litsamaiso tsa matla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Mantsoe a hlalosang tšireletso ea tikoloho, tikoloho le botsitso.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Lipalo tsa batho tse akaretsang lilemo, bong le ho fallela ha batho.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Mehopolo e amanang le taolo ea likhoebo, bo-rakhoebo le ts'ebetso ea lik'hamphani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Mantsoe a amanang le libaka, libaka tsa libaka le litšoantšo tsa mebala.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Litlhaloso le mantsoe a amanang le bophelo bo botle, boiketlo le lipalo-palo tsa bohlokoa.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Mehopolo e amanang le tekanyetso ea lelapa, litšenyehelo le maemo a bophelo.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Mantsoe a hlalosang mehaho ea bolulo le lits'ebeletso tsa bohlokoa tsa toropo.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Mantsoe a moruo a hlalosang kabo ea chelete e kenang, meputso le maruo a malapa.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Mantsoe a amanang le tlhahiso, khoebo le indasteri ea tlhahiso.
glossaryPage2.labour: Mantsoe a amanang le mosebetsi ho kenyeletsoa basebetsi, meputso le 'maraka oa basebetsi.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Mantsoe a hlalosang tsamaiso ea molao, litokelo le tsamaiso ea toka.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Mehopolo e amanang le tlhahiso ea indasteri, lits'ebetso tsa tlhahiso le liketane tsa phepelo.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Lipontšo tsa moruo tse kholo ho kenyeletsoa GDP, chelete ea naha le lipalo tsa lichelete.
glossaryPage2.government: Mantsoe a hlalosang sebopeho sa mmuso, tsamaiso le mekhatlo ea sechaba.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Mantsoe a amanang le palo ea batho le tlhahlobo ea lipalo tsa baahi.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Mehopolo le matšoao a lekanyang bofutsana, ho se lekane le nts'etsopele ea sechaba.
glossaryPage2.prices: Mantsoe a moruo a amanang le inflation, litheko tsa bareki le matla a ho reka.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Mantsoe a hlalosang likhoebo tse ikemetseng, matsete le mesebetsi ea lik'hamphani.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Mantsoe a hlalosang tekanyetso ea mmuso, lekhetho le taolo ea lichelete tsa sechaba.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Mehopolo ea saense le theknoloji e kenyeletsang lipatlisiso le boqapi.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Mantsoe a hlalosang boiketlo ba sechaba, litšebeletso tsa sechaba le maemo a bophelo.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Mantsoe a botekgeniki a hlalosang litekanyetso tsa lipalo, metadata le mekhoa ea data.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Mehopolo e amanang le ho boloka le ho nchafatsa lirekoto tsa khoebo tsa naha.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Mantsoe a amanang le maeto, indasteri ea boikhathollo le lipalo tsa baeti.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Mantsoe a hlalosang phallo ea bohahlauli, mekhoa ea ho fallela le phallo ea batho.
glossaryPage2.trade: Mehopolo e akaretsang khoebo, kantle ho naha le khoebo ea machaba.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Mantsoe a hlalosang lipalangoang, mehaho le marang-rang a puisano.
glossaryPage2.glossaryError: Ha ho lethathamo la mantsoe le fumanoeng
glossaryPage2.bookmarkErrorDetails: Phoso e sa lebelloang e etsahetse.
glossaryPage2.connectionError: Mesebetsi ea ho boloka litlhaku e hloka khokahano ea inthanete.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Ka kopo kena ho boloka lethathamo la mantsoe.
glossaryPage2.Notranslate: Ha ho phetolelo e fumanehang bakeng sa puo ena

termHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda Isichazi-magama
termHelpPage.intro: I-Isichazi-magama yindawo apho unokukhangela khona iintsingiselo zamagama ngeelwimi ezininzi phakathi kweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika. Iseka ukukhangela ngokukhawuleza, ukuhluza ngokolwimi okanye ngokwesigaba, kunye nokusetyenziswa ngaphandle kwe-intanethi xa izichazi-magama zikhutshelwe ngaphambili.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Isichazi-magama sikuvumela ukuba ukhangelisise iintsingiselo zamagama ngeelwimi ezininzi phakathi kweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Igama ngalinye kuMarito liquka ezi nkcukacha zilandelayo:

termFields.language: Ulwimi: Olunye lweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.
termFields.related: Amagama Ahlobene: Amakhonkco aya kwamanye amagama anentsingiselo efanayo okanye enxulumene nayo.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: I-Marito ixhasa zonke iilwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika. Ungasebenzisa ukuhluza ukuze ugxile kulwimi olunye okanye uphande amagama kuwo onke.
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Umsebenzi wokukhangela kuMarito ukunceda ukuba ufumane amagama ngokukhawuleza kuyo yonke iilwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Xa ubhala, iMarito yenza ukukhangela okubukhoma, ibuyekeze iziphumo ngexesha langempela.

searchFields.term: Igama: Ileyibhile okanye ibinzana elimele ingcinga ethile.
searchFields.definition: Inkcazo: Amagama aneentsingiselo eziquka amagama okuphendla nawo aya kubonakala.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: I-Marito inokuphakamisa iziphakamiso okanye amagama ahlobene ngexesha obhala ngalo.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ngokungagqibekanga, iMarito yenza ukukhangela okuqinisekileyo okanye kufutshane nokuqinisekileyo, kodwa ukukhangela okungachanekanga nako kungasebenza.
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Amagama aboniswa kumakhadi aquka igama, ulwimi, icandelo, inkcazo, kunye namaqhosha okuvota.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Ukunciphisa iziphumo, sebenzisa izihluzi ezikhoyo kwiphepha lokukhangela.

filtersList.language: Ulwimi: Nciphisa iziphumo kulwimi olunye kuphela.
filtersList.domain: Icandelo: Gxila kwimimandla enjengeMfundo, Ezempilo, okanye Ubuchwepheshe.
filtersList.fuzzy: Ukukhangela Okungachanekanga: Fumana amagama nokuba kukho iimpazamo zokupela okanye umahluko.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Cofa iqhosha elithi 'Jonga' kwikhadi legama ukuze uvule inkcazo epheleleyo kwaye uphande amagama ahlobene.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: I-Marito ingasetyenziswa ngaphandle kwe-intanethi ngokukhuphela izichazi-magama kwangaphambili.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Emva kokukhuphela, amagama akwesichazi-magama eso aya kuhlala efumaneka nokuba awuxhunyiwanga kwi-intanethi.

workspaceHelpPage.title: Ho Utloisisa Workspace
workspaceHelpPage.intro: Workspace e u lumella ho boloka mantsoe le likhatiso tseo u nang le thahasello ho tsona, ho li hlophisa ka lihlopha, le ho laola lihlopha tseo. Ke moo u ka latelang tsoelo-pele ea likopo tsa hau tsa mantsoe le ho boloka lintlha tsa mosebetsi oa hau.
workspaceHelpPage.groupsBody: Lihlopha li thusa ho hlophisa mantsoe a bolokiloeng. U ka etsa lihlopha tse ncha, ua li reha mabitso a macha, kapa ua hlakola tseo u sa li hlokeng.
groupsSteps: Etsa Sehlopha: Tobetsa konopo ea Sehlopha se Secha, kenya lebitso, khetha mantsoe, ebe u netefatsa ka ho tobetsa Kenya Mantsoe.
Reha Sehlopha Lebitso bocha: Tobetsa letšoao la pentšele pela lebitso la sehlopha, fetola lebitso, ebe u tobetsa Reha Sehlopha Lebitso bocha.
Hlakola Sehlopha: Tobetsa letšoao la ho hlakola, khetha lihlopha tseo u batlang ho li tlosa, ebe u netefatsa ketso.
workspaceHelpPage.moveTitle: Ho Fetisetsa Mantsoe Pakeng tsa Lihlopha
workspaceHelpPage.moveBody: Ho fetisetsa lentsoe sehlopheng se seng, tobetsa letšoao la ho fetisetsa pela lentsoe ebe u khetha sehlopha se secha.
workspaceHelpPage.notesBody: Lintlha li lumella ho eketsa tlhaiso-leseling e eketsehileng mantsoeng a bolokiloeng. U ka etsa, fetola kapa hlakola lintlha ka kotloloho ho Workspace.
notesSteps: Eketsa Tlhahisoleseling: Tobetsa letšoao la lintlha pela lentsoe, ngola tlhaiso-leseling, ebe u tobetsa Boloka.
Fetola Tlhahisoleseling: Tobetsa letšoao la pentšele, fetola mongolo, ebe u tobetsa Boloka.
Hlakola Tlhahisoleseling: Sebelisa khetho ea ho hlakola ho tlosa lintlha tse sa hlokahaleng.
workspaceHelpPage.deleteBody: U ka tlosa lintho ka Workspace neng kapa neng:
deleteSteps: Hlakola Lentsoe: Eya ho Mantsoe a Bolokiloeng, tobetsa letšoao la ho hlakola, ebe u netefatsa.
Hlakola Lethathamo: Eya ho Lethathamo le Bolokiloeng, tobetsa khetho ea ho tlosa, ebe u netefatsa.

settingsHelpPage.title: Dipehelo le Boikamahanyo
settingsHelpPage.intro: Sebelisa leqephe la Dipehelo ho fetola dikgetho tsa hao — ho kenyeletsa sehlooho, dintlha tsa profaele, le phihlello — ho etsa boiphihlelo bo botle ka ho fetisisa bakeng sa hao.
settingsHelpPage.modesTitle: Ho Fetola Pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Monyenyane
settingsHelpPage.modesBody: Mafoko e o dumella ho fetola kapele pakeng tsa mokhoa o khanyang le mokhoa o lefifi ho latela seo o se ratang le tikoloho ya hao. Tshebetso ena e fumaneha maqephe ohle mme e ntlafatsa sebopeho hang-hang ntle le ho sitisa mosebetsi wa hao.
modesSteps: Fumana Konopo: Batla letshwao la letsatsi/khoeli hukung e ka tlase le letsohong le letshoto.
Fetola Mokhoa: Tobetsa letshwao ho fetola hang-hang pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Lefifi.
settingsHelpPage.profileBody: O ka ntlafatsa lebitso, imeile, kapa phasewete neng kapa neng ho tloha diphehong tsa profaele ya hao. Phetoho e nngwe le e nngwe e hloka netefatso bakeng sa tshireletso.
profileSteps: Ntlafatsa Lebitso: Tobetsa Fetola Lebitso, kenya lebitso le letjha, netefatsa ka phasewete ya hao, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Imeile: Tobetsa Fetola Imeile, kenya aterese e ntjha, netefatsa ka phasewete, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Phasewete: Tobetsa Fetola Phasewete, kenya phasewete e ntjha, netefatsa, mme o tobetse Boloka.
settingsHelpPage.accessibilityBody: Mafoko e fana ka dikgetho tse fapaneng tsa phihlello hore o ka ikamahanya le lenaneo ho latela ditlhoko tsa hao. O ka fetola puo, boholo ba mongolo, sebaka, le phapang ya mebala ka ho toba ho menu ya dipehelo.
accessibilitySteps: Fetola Puo ya Lenaneo: Bula lenane la ho theoha mme o kgethe puo eo o e ratang.
Bulela Mokgwa wa Phapang e Phahameng: Tobetsa High Contrast toggle ho fetola mokgwa wa mebala e pharalletseng.

leaningPathHelp.title: Ho Utloisisa Tsela ea Thuto
leaningPathHelp.section1: Tshebetso ya Learning Path e o dumella ho rala leeto le hlophisitsoeng la ho ithuta puo e nngwe ya semmuso ya Afrika Borwa. Ka ho kgetha puo le ho khetha mehlodi eo o batlang ho e ithuta, o ka latela tsela e hlophisitsoeng ho ena le ho hlahloba ka mokhoa o sa reroang.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Tsela e nngwe le e nngwe ya ho ithuta e kopanya di-glossary, lisebelisoa tsa boikoetliso, le ho latela tsoelo-pele ho o thusa hore o lule o tsitsitse le o khothalletswa.
leaningPathHelp.section3: Sebatli sa hao ha se sebetse thegi ya video.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Ka mora ho kgetha puo, o tla kopuwa ho khetha glossary. Glossary e nngwe le e nngwe e hlophisitsoe ho ya ka domain (Thuto, Bophelo, Theknoloji) e le hore o tsepamise maikutlo hodima mantswe a nang le bohlokwa ho wena.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Hang ha glossary ya hao e se e lokile, o ka kgetha kamoo o batlang ho ithuta ka teng
leaningPathHelp.section7: Araba dipotso ho leka tsebo ya hao le ho matlafatsa se o ithutileng sona.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Sebelisa tlhahlobo ya mokhoa wa karete ho aha kutlwisiso le ho hopola mantswe ka lebelo la hao.
leaningPathHelp.section10: Ho Ithuta ka Ditekolo le Likarete
leaningPathHelp.section12: Tsela ya Thuto e latela mesebetsi ya hao hore o bone hore na o fihletse kae. Tsoelo-pele e bontshwa hammoho le dipalo tsa setjhaba, ho etsa hore ho be bonolo ho dula o khothalletswa.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Kopanya Ditsela tsa Thuto le diphephetso tsa beke le beke le dikhau ho fumana mabheji ha o ntse o ntlafatsa bokgoni ba hao ba puo.

helpPage2.section2: Tataiso ea mohato ka mohato bakeng sa ho etsa ak’haonte, ho kena, le ho tsamaisa sethala lekhetlo la pele.
helpPage2.section3Desc: Ithute ho beha litaba, ho fana ka maikutlo, le ho sebelisana le ba bang ka lisebelisoa tsa sechaba tse kang likhetho le lipuisano.
helpPage2.dictionaryDesc: Batla mantsoe a lipuo tse fapaneng, bulela patlo e sa hlakang, ’me u hlophise litlhophiso tsa bukantswe ea hau.
helpPage2.glossaryDesc: Hlophisa, sefa, le ho romela li-glossary ka sehlopha, lefapha, kapa polokelo ea phetolelo.
helpPage2.workspaceDesc: Boloka le ho tsamaisa mantsoe le li-glossary tsa hao, latela likopo, le sebelisana u sebelisa lintlha le lihlopha.
helpPage2.settingsDesc: Fetola likhetho tse kang mokhoa o lefifi/kapa o khanyang, likhetho tsa phihlello, lintlha tsa profaele, le litlhophiso tse ling tsa mosebelisi.
helpPage2.homeDesc: Hlahloba ’mapa o sebelisanang oa Afrika Borwa, fumana mantsoe a sa tloaelehang, ’me u fumane kakaretso ea litaba tse khethehileng.
helpPage2.dashboardDesc: Latela ts'ebetso ea sethala ka litšoantšo, sheba data, ’me u hlahlobe menehelo ea hau sebakeng se le seng.
helpPage2.learningPathDesc: Rala leeto le hlophisitsoeng la ho ithuta e ’ngoe ea lipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa.
helpPage2.feedbackDesc: Romela litlhahiso, litlotla, kapa litletlebo ho sehlopha ka kotloloho ho thusa ho ntlafatsa sethala.
helpPage2.faqsDesc: Likarabo tsa lipotso tse tloaelehileng mabapi le sethala.

workspace.section1: Ha u hokahane le inthanete. Tlhokomeliso ea hau e bolokiloe 'me e tla hokahana ha u khutlela inthaneteng.
workspace.section2: E hlolehile ho boloka lintlha. Ka kopo leka hape.
workspace.section3: Ka kopo kena ho hlakola li-bookmark.
workspace.section4: E hlolehile ho hlakola lentsoe. Ka kopo leka hape.
workspace.section5: Ka kopo kena ho hlakola lihlopha.
workspace.section7: E hlolehile ho hlakola lihlopha. Ka kopo leka hape.
workspace.section9: Na u tiile hore u batla ho hlakola
workspace.section10: Sena se tla fetisetsa mantsoe 'ohle a lihlopha tsena ho sehlopha sa "Mantsoe ’Ohle".
workspace.section11: Ka kopo kenya lebitso la sehlopha
workspace.section12: Sehlopha se nang le lebitso lena se se se ntse se le teng
workspace.section13: Ka kopo kena ho theha lihlopha.
workspace.section26: Theha sehlopha se secha ho hlophisa mantsoe a hau a bolokiloeng.
workspace.section27: Khetha Mantsoe a ho Kenyelletsa Sehlopheng
workspace.section28: Khetha mantsoe ao u batlang ho a kenya sehlopheng sa hau se secha. U ka khetha a mangata.
workspace.section29: Ha ho mantsoe a bookmark a fumanehang. Etsa bookmark pele ho kenya lihlopha.
